があっと: (があっと) - with a grinding noise
がかる: (がかる) - (after a noun)  to appear .../to look like .../to seem ...; to have a trace of/to be tinged with
がくがく: (gakugaku) - corpo tremendo, dentes batendo, algo se soltando
がくんと: (がくんと) - suddenly; with a jerk
がさがさ: (がさがさ) - rustling; dry or rough feeling
がさっ: (ガサッ) - with a swoosh; at one fell swoop
がさり: (がさり) - rustling sound; search (esp. a home search by the police)
がさる: (がさる) - to search (esp. a home in a police search)
がさ入れ: (がさいれ) - (がさ derives from a reversal of さがす)  premises search; household search
がしゃがしゃ: (ガシャガシャ) - (pieces of metal, etc. hitting each other) noisily; cluttered/disordered/messy
がしゃん: (がっしゃん) - crash; smash; crunch; bang; breaking sound
がしんたれ: (がしんたれ) - good-for-nothing; bum; loser; coward
がじがじ: (ガジガジ) - biting/gnawing; in constant pain/irritated
がじゃがじゃ: (がじゃがじゃ) - rummage (in a drawer)
がせねた: (がせねた) - faked information; bogus intelligence; disinformation
がせネタ: (がせねた) - faked information; bogus intelligence; disinformation
がたいがいい: (がたいがいい) - (exp,adj-ix) big and brawny; well built; gigantic
がたいが良い: (がたいがよい) - big and brawny; well built; gigantic
がたがくる: (がたがくる) - to show one's age (e.g. to start creaking at the joints); to wear out (e.g. machinery)
がたっと: (がたっと) - with a clunk/with a clank; the sound of a sudden decrease (in profits, vigor, etc.)
がたつく: (がたつく) - to rattle; to be bumpy; to be shaky; to be unsteady
がたん: (がたん) - (with a) bump; (with a) bang; (with a) crash; sharply
がちがち: (がちがち) - chattering (teeth); (frozen, worried) stiff; rigid (personality, thinking, etc.)/inflexible/overly serious; voracious (e.g. work, study)/without slack or pause
がちっと: (がちっと) - with a clashing or clanging sound
がちゃつく: (がちゃつく) - to clatter/to rattle; to turn into a ruckus
がちゃん: (がちん) - (with a) slamming noise (door, telephone receiver); (with a) banging noise; (with a) clash (broken dish); (with a) clank; (with a) bang
がちん: (がちん) - (with a) slamming noise (door, telephone receiver); (with a) banging noise; (with a) clash (broken dish); (with a) clank; (with a) bang
がちんこ: (ガチンコ) - competing in earnest (esp. in sumo)
がっかり: (がっかり) - feel disappointed; dejected; lose heart; feel emotionally drained; feel let down
がっくり: (がっくり) - heartbroken; crestfallen; dejected; disappointed
がっしゃん: (がっしゃん) - crash; smash; crunch; bang; breaking sound
がったんごっとん: (がったんごっとん) - clickety-clack (e.g. train sound)
がっちり: (がっちり) - solidly built; tightly; shrewd; calculating
がっつく: (がっつく) - to be greedy; to devour greedily
がっつり: (ガッツリ) - firmly; plentifully; with all one's might
がっぷり: (がっぷり) - firmly (grasped); latched onto; locked onto
がっぽがっぽ: (がっぽがっぽ) - in large quantities
がつがつ: (ガツガツ) - greedily; burning with desire for something
がつん: (がつん) - klop/klunk/whonk/crash/thump; with a heavy impact/forcibly
がつんと言う: (がつんという) - to tell a person (something) emphatically; to let a person have it
がてら: (がてら) - on the same occasion; at the same time; coincidentally; along with; partly (to do, for)
がな: (がなあ) - (at sentence-end)  particle used to indicate the speaker's hope, desire, wish, etc. (e.g. "it would be nice if ...", "I wish there were ...", etc.); (at sentence-end) emphatic particle; (often associated with an interrogative) particle adding uncertainty
がなあ: (がなあ) - (at sentence-end)  particle used to indicate the speaker's hope, desire, wish, etc. (e.g. "it would be nice if ...", "I wish there were ...", etc.); (at sentence-end) emphatic particle; (often associated with an interrogative) particle adding uncertainty
がなり立てる: (がなりたてる) - to yell; to shout
がね: (がね) - (positive sentence end) I dare say; (negative sentence end) though, honestly
がはと: (かばと) - suddenly; all of a sudden; quickly; emphatically; energetically
がばがば: (がばがば) - over-sized; in large quantities
がばっと: (かばと) - suddenly; all of a sudden; quickly; emphatically; energetically
がばと: (かばと) - suddenly; all of a sudden; quickly; emphatically; energetically
がびがび: (がびがび) - dried stiff (esp. of something sticky)
がぶがぶ: (がぶがぶ) - gulping down/guzzling; sloshing around (e.g. liquid in one's stomach, esp. from drinking too much)
がぶりと: (がぶりと) - emphatically (bite, gulp, chew, etc.)
がぶり付く: (がぶりつく) - to bite at; to snap at; to sink one's teeth into
がぶり寄り: (がぶりより) - {sumo} pushing the opponent with the torso
がぶる: (がぶる) - to pitch (e.g. a boat); {sumo} to force out an opponent
がましい: (がましい) - look like; sound like; savor of; smack of
がま口: (がまぐち) - (etym: toad's mouth)  purse with a metal clasp; handbag (with clasp); pouch (with clasp); coin purse (with clasp)
がみがみ声: (がみがみこえ) - growling voice; snarling voice
がめつい: (がめつい) - greedy; grasping; predatory; calculating; avaricious
がめる: (ガメる) - to greedily try to win big (e.g. in mahjong); to swipe/to nick/to pilfer
がめ煮: (がめに) - chicken stew with taro, carrot, burdock, etc.
がや: (がや) - background chatter on a soundtrack; extra (actor); (and) many others
がやがや: (カヤカヤ) - noisily; in a crowd of people talking; clamorously; in a hubbub
